subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Fewell’s job seemed safe last week as Coach Tom Coughlin defended him after a 6-10 season, but the Giants were ranked 29th in total defense in the N.F.L.
snippet: Fewell’s job seemed safe last week as Coach Tom Coughlin defended him after a 6-10 season, but the Giants were ranked 29th in total defense in the N.F.L.
